system.description:
The Saint (FOUNDER OF THE HOLY CHURCH)
You may not be trained in occult lore, or mortal combat. But you know evil, and you know good. So long as good people stand against evil, you will be there with them to keep them safe.

MAKING YOUR FOUNDER

Stats

You start with this array:
  • Iron +1
  • Glass +2
  • Sulphur -1
  • Mercury 0
  • Blood starts at 0.

Looks

Ancient and venerable; young and naive; grizzled survivor.

Names

Irene, Timothy, Marija, Dobroslav, Zhang,Costin, Malina.

Weapon

Choose one:

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.gear.Item.oQZI0a3WrzBnwQpw]{Sling}

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.gear.Item.o2pe8E02d6JqZXL2]{Ceremonial Staff}

HISTORY

One of the other founders joined your flock and helped spread your healing truth. Give their bloodline 2-pact on you. You say how you blessed them, they say what doubts remain.

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.moves.Item.ZGzjsYJG2OD65Use]{Martyrdom}
